titles: An elegie to the memory of Richard Earl of Tyrconnel, late Deputy of Ireland, and General of the bog-trotting army, who departed this life in Limerick, on Tuesday August the 8th. 1691.
notes: Date of publication from by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in: National Library of Scotland.
